snippet.title: Frameland: A Binary Tale — Official Gameplay Trailer [OUT NOW!]
snippet.description:
In this first official trailer, we showcase the gameplay and combat in Frameland: A Binary Tale, the upcoming pixel-art indie RPG.

🕹️ Master the art of timing in our unique turn-based battles. Execute powerful attacks, block enemy blows, and strategically use items to survive the malevolent swarms.

🔄 Tailor your experience with remnants, special artifacts that enhance characters and provide unique skills. Your choices will shape the outcome of battles.

📜 Unravel the mysteries of Condorra as Ryiu, transported to a foreign land with no recollection of past events. Join allies, confront adversaries, and unveil carefully concealed truths.

🎨 Immerse yourself in the charm of old-school pixel art and let the original 16-bit-style soundtrack evoke the golden era of JRPGs.

#jrpg #indiegame #rpg
